title: Stor 3 v√¶relses bolig med egen altan og optimal plantegning
description:
Om boligen:

Denne sk√∏nne og optimerede lejlighed starter med at byde dig velkommen i et lyst entr√©omr√•de med plads til at h√¶nge overt√∏jet og med adgang til et stort sovev√¶relse, hvor der er plads til den store seng ‚Äì fra sovev√¶relset har du yderligere adgang til lejlighedens depotrum, som med fordel kan bruges til walk-in, hvis dette foretr√¶kkes. Fra entr√©en har du ydermere adgang til badev√¶relset, som er opf√∏rt i et tidl√∏st l√¶kkert design, rummeligt og med separat bruseniche og hertil b√•de med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. I det store lyse k√∏kken-alrum finder du et l√¶kkert fuldt udstyret hvidt k√∏kken med k√∏le-/fryseskab, ovn, kogeplader, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine samt god opbevaringsplads. Stuen er godt indrettet med optimale anvendelsesmuligheder, hvor der veludnyttet kan etableres b√•de en sofa- og spiseafdeling. Stuen munder ud i en sydvendt terrasse, hvor sol og frisk luft kan nydes og hvor du har kig ud over det n√¶rliggende villaomr√•de. Fra stuen finder du ogs√• lejlighedens sidste v√¶relse, som har plads til b√•de seng og skrivebord. 

  Hele lejligheden er desuden installeret med gulvvarme, som kan justeres individuelt i de enkelte rum.

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

Om Banehaverne:

 

 Banehaverne er tegnet af det prisvindende arkitektfirma Sweco Architects, som har √∏nsket at skabe en ejendom med fokus p√• f√¶llesskab og livskvalitet.

Ejendommen rummer i alt 16 bygninger (inkl. r√¶kkehuse), der centrerer sig omkring smukke g√•rdrum med legearealer og rolige opholdszoner. I alt kommer her 6 unikke g√•rdrum, som forbindes af en lang sti, som snor sig gennem hele komplekset og ender i det store aktivitetsomr√•de Kilen.

 

Kort om omr√•det:

 

 Omr√•det omkring Banehaverne byder p√• en harmonisk blanding af natur, kultur og byliv.

Her er storsl√•et natur ved b√•de vand og skov, gode skoler og daginstitutioner samt et v√¶ld af fritidstilbud inden for b√•de friluftsliv, idr√¶t og kreative aktiviteter.

Alt sammen er med til at skabe de bedste foruds√¶tninger for en hverdag, der glider nemt og er rig p√• sjove og sp√¶ndende muligheder.

Banehaverne nyder godt af deres strategiske placering t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavn. Med kun 10 min. gang til Glostrup Station og nem adgang til motorvejsnetv√¶rket er K√∏benhavn t√¶t p√•. Det √•bner d√∏rene til en bred vifte af jobmuligheder og uddannelsesinstitutioner. Du kan nyde godt af den korte afstand til K√∏benhavn, mens du stadig kan tr√¶kke dig tilbage til den rolige atmosf√¶re i Glostrup/Br√∏ndby om aftenen.

title: 163 kvm √òsterbro Oase
description:
Velkommen til Rosendalsgade, en stille og charmerende sidegade til den velkendte Willemoesgade p√• √òsterbro. Her f√•r du muligheden for at bo i en m√∏bleret lejlighed, der ikke bare er stor og rummelig, men som ogs√• emmer af personlighed og hjemlighed ‚Äì uden at du beh√∏ver g√∏re andet end at flytte ind.

Lejligheden er p√• hele 163 kvadratmeter og fordeler sig over tre gode sovev√¶relser, et stort og indbydende opholdsrum, et sk√∏nt k√∏kken-alrum med plads til b√•de madlavning og samv√¶r, et dejligt badev√¶relse samt et ekstra g√¶stetoilet. Alt st√•r klar til dig, med m√∏bler i god kvalitet og en atmosf√¶re, der balancerer det stilrene med det hyggelige. Det f√∏les som et hjem ‚Äì ikke bare en midlertidig adresse.

Fra alrummet er der direkte udgang til en stor altan, som vender ud mod g√•rden. Herude er der fred og ro, langt fra byens st√∏j, selvom du er midt i det hele. En perfekt lille oase til morgenkaffen eller aftensolen.

Beliggenheden taler for sig selv. Rosendalsgade er √©n af de gader, hvor √òsterbro viser sig fra sin bedste side: rolige omgivelser, gr√∏nne tr√¶er, caf√©er rundt om hj√∏rnet og masser af lokalt liv. Du er t√¶t p√• b√•de F√¶lledparken, s√∏erne, Nordhavn og alt det, der g√∏r K√∏benhavn til en by, man rent faktisk gider bo i.

Lejeperioden er ni m√•neder, og boligen udlejes m√∏bleret ‚Äì ideel til dig, der er p√• udkig efter en tryg base i K√∏benhavn for en stund. Det her er ikke bare en lejlighed. Det er et hjem midt i byen, klar til at blive dit i en periode.

title: Renovatated furnised apartment in Gentofte/Vangede for 1-3 month with possibility for extension
description:
Dear Renter

I have my 59 m2 apartment in Vangede/Gentofte, furnished as you see in picture. Right now it is furnished for 2 persons with a sleeping- and and living room, nice kitchen and bathroom. It will ready and furnished from 01.07.2025 as current renter wants to go back to their country after trying living in DK and job situation was not good. It is not for family with kids, better for single or couples.

The apartment will be rented out 1 month at a time with the possibility of extension. The apartment is undersold and you must be open to working with the real estate agent and keeping it neat for viewing.

Rent is 13.000 dkr. plus heat/water every month (Electricity, you will be connect yourself so it will be direct). Deposit is 13.000 dkr. and if you of course treat the apartment nice you will get all money back (I have references here from earlier renters). Price is including Internet and please note there is no TV, but you are welcome bring one.

Hope you like the design of funishing and check out the area. There are busses close and 25 minutes to center of Cph.

*washing machine and drying tumbler in basement.

Kristian K.

title: A beautiful 3 room furnished apartment which is ready to move in in the heart of Lyngby C with a lot of commercial facilities, eateries and nature around.
description:
Much more central in Lyngby, it's hard to find, even with Wilmanns Park in the backyard: Here you should look at a classic three-bedroom apartment with a well-designed floor plan that offers two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen and a shower room.

The apartment is 87 square metres, and infill doors, beautiful floors, light stucco and individual ceiling spots provide a generally good and neat apartment to be able to move straight into. There is a separate kitchen with all amenities. The storage space in here is excellent with all white goods, and on the whole, built-in storage has been cleverly thought out in the floor plan. The apartment generally offers decor-friendly rooms with lots of natural light from the good window sections - on the bright bathroom and the window also ensure a good indoor climate.

You move into a red-stone property from 1934, which offers a terrace environment surrounded by fences and individual trees on one side of the building with further access to green path systems and Wilmanns Park, and on the other side you have Ulrikkenborg Plads and everything that Lyngby holds. Possibility of parking behind the property (first come, first served basis)

Lyngby Station is literally just around the corner, where the A and E lines can get you to Copenhagen H in just 25 minutes. The commuter thus finds it enormously easy to work in the big city, just as the weekend excursion gets off to a flying start. English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager F√¶lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager F√¶lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

Spacious, bright, and modern 108 m2 apartment with an amazing view from the 6th floor is available for rent from August 1, 2025. Nestled in a newer residential area, this stylish apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Located moments away from Fields shopping center and the efficient metro system, it provides an ideal urban lifestyle. With 108 square meters of living space, this apartment caters to couples, families, or young professionals seeking more space.

The interior features a modern and minimalist design with an open floor plan, large windows, and high-quality finishes that create an inviting and bright atmosphere. The kitchen boasts sleek cabinetry, modern appliances, and ample counter space, making it a pleasure to prepare meals and entertain guests. The living area is designed for comfort and flexibility, allowing you to arrange your furniture to suit your lifestyle. Flooded with natural light, the living area provides access to the large private balcony (13 square meters) where you can enjoy the sunset and Copenhagen‚Äôs skyline.

The apartment offers two bedrooms, providing privacy and comfort for the whole family or guests. Both bedrooms include built-in wardrobes. Additionally, there is a shower bathroom with floor heating, ample storage, and a washing machine and dryer.

Within walking distance, you‚Äôll find various day-care facilities, kindergartens, primary schools, a high school, and a library. Grocery stores like Netto and Rema1000 are just 5 minutes away, along with Fields shopping center offering a variety of shops, a cinema, and Copenhagen‚Äôs only hypermarket (Bilka). The area around Byparken in front of the apartment also features cafes, bakeries, restaurants, and ice cream stands.

The apartment includes a private storage room and bicycle parking in the basement.

Midt i Valby finder du denne nybyggede ejendom, der rummer en dejlig lejlighed. Her kan du se frem til en optimal planl√∏sning og l√¶kre materialevalg, og dette antal v√¶relser er boligen oplagt til b√•de parret eller den lille familie.

Entr√©en ligger i √•ben forbindelse med resten af boligen, og den fremtr√¶der endvidere med god plads til overt√∏jet i det faste skab. I badev√¶relset er der bruseniche og plads til en smart vaskes√∏jle. Sovev√¶relset brillerer med sin sublime st√∏rrelse og det fabelagtige lysindfald.

K√∏kkenet er pladsbesparende indrettet langs den ene side, og s√•ledes pr√¶senterer det √•bne opholdsrum sig som en sp√¶ndende oase med et v√¶ld af indretningsmuligheder. Stuen er trefoldigt herlig med indgang til et funktionelt depotrum, et bredt vinduesparti og en terrassed√∏r, som f√∏rer ud p√• den sydvendte altan med vue til nabolaget. 

Den byn√¶re placering giver dig mindre end en halv kilometer til daginstitution, skole og MENY. Samme afstand f√∏rer dig til Valby Station, og n√¶romr√•det byder endvidere p√• l√¶kre caf√©er ved Valby Langgade samt sk√∏nne shopping-muligheder i Spinderiet.

Get an exclusive base in the middle of the city with green surroundings right outside your door. This exclusive corner apartment offers a very special atmosphere, where light and air is in focus. The home is enriched with a multitude of windows that ensure natural light all day long and a fantastic view.

From here, a staircase leads to the apartment's private roof terrace - a rare luxury in the middle of the city, where you can enjoy the sun, peace and views over the rooftops of Copenhagen.

Do you dream of living in the middle of Copenhagen, with a view of the Copenhagen rooftops? Now you have the opportunity to live in this bright and inviting penthouse apartment on attractive Ryesgade - one of the city's most charming streets.

NOTE: The images are of a similar residence and property in Carlsberg Byen. The floor plan is accurate.

An exclusive, newly built, and spacious 2-room apartment is now available for rent in the popular Carlsberg Byen, located in H√∏ffings T√•rn.

The apartment features an optimal layout, making full use of every square meter. Upon entering, you step into the kitchen area, which has space for a dining table. The kitchen, designed by HTH, has a sleek and minimalist aesthetic with a handleless design, a white countertop, and built-in appliances from Miele. From the kitchen and dining area, you have direct access to the apartment‚Äôs French balcony with a folding door‚Äîor through the bedroom‚Äîallowing you to enjoy a view of the rest of Copenhagen.

The kitchen flows seamlessly into the living room, which is set back from the entrance, creating depth and a natural flow throughout the apartment. Adjacent to the living room, you will find the bedroom.
The bathroom is designed with drawer modules, a laundry tower (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and a sink in artificial marble from Marmorline. The walls and floors of the bathroom are adorned with pastel green Mosa tiles.
Overall, this apartment is executed in a minimalist and Nordic style, with great attention to aesthetics. The flooring consists of white-pigmented, lacquered oak planks from BOEN, featuring underfloor heating throughout the entire apartment. The fixtures are from Grohe, and all appliances are from Miele.

Included in the apartment: All appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, and cooktop.

Included in the property: Basement storage, bicycle storage, and a courtyard area. Parking spaces are available for rent.

title: Apartment available in the inner city of Copenhagen
description:
Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, Str√∏get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 13,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also You write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

description:
Flot eksklusivt m√∏bleret lejlighed med 2 badev√¶relser.

Lejligheden best√•r af flot √•bent k√∏kken med spiseplads og udgang til stor delvist overd√¶kket altan hvorfra der er udsigt Amager Strandpark og vandet. I direkte forbindelse til k√∏kkenet ligger den dejlige opholdsstue, hvor en stor skyded√∏r kan adskille opholdsstuen helt fra k√∏kkenet.
Desuden stor spisestue hvorfra der er adgang til de to v√¶relser og et badev√¶relse med vaskes√∏jle. Fra spisestuen er der desuden adgang til altan med udsigt over √òresund.
Fra for√¶ldre sovev√¶relset er der direkte adgang til stor badev√¶relse med brus.
Alt i alt en sk√∏n lejlighed med Amager Strandpark lige p√• den anden side af vejen og mindre en 500 meter til √òresund Metrostation hvorfra turen til lufthavnen tager 6 minutter og til Kgs. Nytorv tager 7 minutter.

******* English presentation ******* 

Beautifully furnished exclusive apartment with 2 bathrooms.

The apartment consists of a beautiful open kitchen with a dining area and access to a large partially covered balcony, offering views of Amager Strandpark and the water. Directly connected to the kitchen is the lovely living room, where a large sliding door can completely separate the living room from the kitchen. 

Additionally, there is a spacious dining room, which provides access to the two bedrooms and a bathroom with a washing column. From the dining room, there is also access to the balcony with views over the √òresund.

The master bedroom has direct access to a large bathroom with a shower.

All in all, a lovely apartment with Amager Strandpark just across the street, and less than 500 meters to √òresund Metro Station, where the journey to the airport takes 6 minutes and to Kgs. Nytorv takes 7 minutes.

title: HELT ny 2-v√¶relses med k√¶mpe tagterrasse
description:
OBS - Billederne er fra en pr√∏vebolig, men VIDEOEN er fra denne bolig. 

Project Radio ligger p√• Gyngemose Parkvej i S√∏borg, som husede DR fra 1963 til 2007. Over de seneste √•r er den tidligere TV-Byen blevet omdannet til et attraktivt og livligt boligomr√•de.
Mere end 1.000 nye moderne boliger, erhverv, butikker, privathospital og store, gr√∏nne arealer pryder omr√•det. 

I de nye suver√¶ne lejeboliger i 1 eller 2 plan er der plads til mindre og st√∏rre b√∏rnefamilier. Boligerne varierer mellem 2-5 v√¶relser og 49-112 m2, s√• du kan finde en lejlighed, der passer til dig og din families behov.

Tr√¶d ind og f√∏l dig hjemme p√• de mat lakerede tr√¶gulve, der st√•r i kontrast til det r√• betonloft med et sandbl√¶st udtryk og de hvide v√¶gge, der s√¶tter stilen i din nye bolig. Kontrasten mellem det lyse og lette gulv og det r√•, h√•rde betonloft bringer en dynamisk indretning til live, s√• boligen emmer af moderne nordisk design.

Dine nye over- og underskabe fra HTH har en slidst√¶rk, lysegr√• lakering, der ligesom dit badev√¶relse bliver let at holde rent. I overskabene er der installeret LED-spots, der oplyser den flotte bordplade af massiv eg.
De rene linjer spiller nydeligt sammen med indbygningsskabe til k√∏le-/ fryseskab, ovn, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine. Armaturet er fra Oras Saga, der er et brugervenligt, robust og alsidigt armatur i moderne, nordisk design.
Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

Badev√¶relset er i tr√•d med den h√∏je kvalitet, som kendetegner boligen. P√• gulv og i bruseniche er der matte, m√∏rkegr√• klinker, der elegant spiller sammen med de tilsvarende fliser p√• v√¶ggene. Det v√¶gh√¶ngte og vandsparende toilet med soft luk fra Villeroy & Boch har indbygningscisterne.
Den flotte keramiske h√•ndvask er placeret over stilrene Dansani-skabe med glatte, hvide overflader, der er lette for dig at vedligeholde. Der medf√∏lger ogs√• en vaskes√∏jle med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler fra Vestfrost. Armaturer i h√•ndvask og bruseniche er fra Grohe.

Project Radio byder p√• mange sk√∏nne f√¶llesfaciliteter, som hele familien kan benytte sig af. Her kan b√∏rnene hygge sig, ligesom du kan invitere til b√∏rnef√∏dselsdage med aktiviteter og spil.
De mange f√¶llesomr√•der inde og ude byder p√• fremragende faciliteter som f.eks. l√¶sesal, vaskeri og fitnessrum, som du har adgang til alle ugens dage. Her kan du fordybe dig, klare det praktiske og holde formen ved lige ‚Äì og efterf√∏lgende tr√¶kke dig tilbage i dit nye hjem.

Familieboligerne i Project Radio ligger i natursk√∏nne omgivelser p√• gr√¶nsen til K√∏benhavn, hvorfra du hurtigt kan ramme en supercykelsti. Omr√•det er yderst b√∏rnevenligt, og inden for f√• hundrede meter finder du bl.a. daginstitutionerne Solstr√•len, M√•nestr√•len og Mosen samt M√∏rkh√∏j Skole, Enghaveg√•rd Skole og Tingbjerg Skole.

Omr√•det i Gyngemose Park er et livligt milj√∏ med kontorerhverv og boligejendomme, der er omgivet af store, gr√∏nne f√¶llesarealer. Her finder du ogs√• butikker til de daglige indk√∏b. I den lokale idr√¶tshal Gyngemosehallen og i Bl√•g√•rd Sv√∏mmehal kan du og b√∏rnene f√• sved p√• panden.

description:

Now you can rent a lovely 1-bedroom apartment in S√∏borg!

Project Radio on Gyngemose Parkvej in S√∏borg, formerly known as DR's TV-Byen, has been transformed into an attractive residential area with modern 1-bedroom apartments. No student ID is required to rent these units ‚Äì they are available to everyone.

ENGLISH VERSION
Charming 2-Room Apartment near Amagerbrogade
In order to be closer to my workplace during my postgraduate medical training, I am renting out my apartment for the coming year.

A bit about the apartment:‚Ä®
The apartment includes an entrance hall. From here, you have access to a cozy and spacious living room featuring a New Yorker wall, decorative ceiling molding, and light wooden floors. In addition to the living room, the apartment has a bedroom facing the courtyard. The apartment also offers a neat and bright kitchen with plenty of cabinet space. Lastly, there's a nice bathroom with a separate shower. A loft storage space is available for use during the rental period. A washing machine and dryer are located on the kitchen stairway and are shared with the neighbor. The building also has a charming backyard where you can enjoy your afternoon coffee. The apartment is rented out unfurnished.

A bit about the area:‚Ä®
The apartment is located on a quiet side street off Amagerbrogade in Copenhagen S, Amager, close to caf√©s and shopping options. It's situated 2.7 km from the center of Copenhagen and about 950 meters from the nearest metro stations: Lergravsparken and Amagerbro. Bus 5C stops just 20 meters from the apartment. For those with a car, resident parking is available in the area.

Size: 57 sqm consisting of: 2 rooms, an entrance hall, kitchen, and bathroom‚Ä®Rent: DKK 11,000/month excluding utilities‚Ä®
Utilities: Approx. DKK 800 (Water & Heating)‚Ä®
Deposit: 3 months' rent‚Ä®
Rental period: Move-in is possible from the beginning of May, and the rental period is initially one year (possibly with the option of extension). Up to 2 CPR registrations are allowed at the address.

title: Charmerende lejlighed i hjertet af K√∏benhavn ved Nyboder
description:
English version:
____________________________________________________________________________________

Breathtaking Views & Hidden Charm ‚Äì A Unique Home in Historic Copenhagen
We are proud to present this rare gem of an apartment, perfectly positioned between some of Copenhagen‚Äôs most iconic landmarks. From your living room window, take in the stunning panoramic view of both Marmorkirken‚Äôs majestic dome and the charming rooftops of Nyboder ‚Äì a daily reminder that you‚Äôre living in the heart of Danish history.

An Elegant Blend of Character and Comfort
Set in a classic Copenhagen building with soul and style, this fully furnished apartment offers 56 sqm of thoughtfully designed space. The home combines traditional details with modern amenities ‚Äì creating a warm, functional, and inspiring atmosphere for everyday living.
Enjoy a bright living area with large windows framing the city‚Äôs architectural beauty, a stylish bedroom with excellent storage, and a sleek, updated bathroom.

The heart of the home is the cozy private terrace, nestled in a lush, quiet courtyard ‚Äì a peaceful green oasis where you can unwind, enjoy a meal, or simply soak up the charm of your surroundings.

Location ‚Äì Between Serenity and the City Pulse
Located in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most sought-after neighborhoods, this home is tucked away on a quiet street just moments from √òsterport Station, Amalienborg, Kastellet, and the harborfront. Step outside your door and find yourself surrounded by charming caf√©s, cultural landmarks, vibrant city life, and tranquil green spaces ‚Äì all within walking distance.

Perfect for the Modern Urbanite
Whether you're an expat, a couple, or a professional looking for a stylish, serene home base, this apartment offers the perfect balance of central convenience and quiet charm.

Available immediately.

Dansk version:
____________________________________________________________________________________
Betagende udsigt og skjult charme ‚Äì et unikt hjem i det historiske K√∏benhavn
Vi er stolte af at kunne pr√¶sentere denne sj√¶ldne perle af en lejlighed, perfekt placeret mellem nogle af K√∏benhavns mest ikoniske vartegn. Fra dit stuevindue kan du nyde den fantastiske panoramaudsigt over b√•de Marmorkirkens majest√¶tiske kuppel og de charmerende tage p√• Nyboder ‚Äì en daglig p√•mindelse om, at du bor i hjertet af danmarkshistorien.

En elegant blanding af karakter og komfort
Beliggende i en klassisk k√∏benhavnsk bygning med sj√¶l og stil, denne fuldt m√∏blerede lejlighed byder p√• 56 kvm gennemt√¶nkt udformet plads. Boligen kombinerer traditionelle detaljer med moderne bekvemmeligheder ‚Äì skaber en varm, funktionel og inspirerende atmosf√¶re til hverdagen.
Nyd et lyst opholdsomr√•de med store vinduer, der indrammer byens arkitektoniske sk√∏nhed, et stilfuldt sovev√¶relse med fremragende opbevaring og et elegant, opdateret badev√¶relse.

title: Do you dream of living in the vibrant Vesterbro?
description:
Do you dream of living in the vibrant Vesterbro? Discover the charm of Vesterbro in this beautiful, partially furnished 3-room apartment covering 84 sqm, situated on the raised ground floor. The apartment masterfully combines classic Copenhagen allure with modern conveniences and an attractive location in the heart of a bustling urban area.

Enjoy life in two spacious, connected living rooms that naturally come together to form a large, open living space with plenty of room for both daily life and entertaining guests. This unique feature adds an open and welcoming atmosphere to the home, encouraging social gatherings.

The kitchen brims with charm and is equipped with everything you need: a stove, oven, washing machine, and microwave ‚Äì perfect for cooking and cozy dinners. The classic Copenhagen bathroom has been completely renovated, blending timeless elegance with contemporary comfort.

The apartment is taken over partially furnished (see more below), offering you a unique opportunity to put your personal touch on the home while enjoying the furnishings already available.

Located in the sought-after Vesterbro, you are placed in the heart of Copenhagen with immediate access to the city's many offerings. From cozy cafes and unique shops to a wide range of cultural experiences ‚Äì everything is within walking distance.

- Location: Vesterbro, Copenhagen ‚Äì raised ground floor.
- Size: 84 sqm, 3 rooms. Not suitable for sharing.
- Facilities: Classic Copenhagen bathroom (completely renovated), charming kitchen with stove, oven, washing machine, and microwave, partially furnished.
- Special features: Two connected living rooms, modern facilities, light and open atmosphere.
- Partially furnished: Bed, 2 chest of drawers, closet, table and chairs, pc table and chair, sofa. More information upon showing. 

Note, I'm looking to rent it out as soon as possible. 

A few key points about the rental:
* The rental period is limited to a maximum of two years, as I‚Äôll be away temporarily.
* Utilities (water, heat, gas, internet) summise to 1674 kr. monthly, with water, heat, and electricity depending on use (so money back if you use less or pay additional if you use a lot). So far I‚Äôve always gotten money back on heat and water each year. 
* Subletting or shared tenancy is not allowed without written permission.
* No pets are allowed ‚Äì including small companion animals.
* Smoking is not permitted in the apartment, and I‚Äôm specifically looking for a non-smoker.
* The wood-burning stove may not be used.
* The apartment is rented out partially furnished, and the furniture may not be removed without agreement.
* Drilling into bathroom tiles or decorative stucco is not allowed, and the apartment‚Äôs current wall colors must be respected unless otherwise agreed.

If you‚Äôre still interested, I‚Äôd appreciate it if you could share a bit more about yourself:
* What is your current housing situation, and why are you looking for a new place?
* Would you be living by yourself or are you more that will be living together?
* When would you ideally move in, and how long are you looking to stay?
* What do you do for work, and is the rent within your budget?
* Are you comfortable with the apartment being partially furnished?
* Do you have an special needs, expectations or questions to the apartment I should know?

title: Nice sunny apartment with private parking
description:
Elegant, modern and furnished two bedroom apartment with south facing panoramic windows for rent. The apartment is placed on the second floor in a beautiful and well-maintained building with private parking and elevator by renowned architects, Schmidt Hammer Lassen. The whole apartment complex is secured by private surveillance cameras.

There are build-in closets in the hallway, a spacious living area with kitchen and dining area and a spacious bathroom with washer and dryer. The apartment boasts two bedrooms with plenty of closet space. One of the bedrooms is currently used as a home office but can be refurnished into a second bedroom if so desired. 
The apartment is very well planned out and suitable for one person or a couple. It is located within walking distance from the historical city center, either along the harbour at Langelinje by the little mermaid or through the beautiful and green area of the Citadel. 

100 meters from the apartment you find an excellent fitness studio, an artisan bakery and a grocery store. √òsterport station is located just 200 meters away with both train and metro connections.

description:
Flot lejlighed med solrig altan til leje i K√∏benhavn. 
Her kan du bo midt i naturen og midt i byen i denne l√¶kre 3 rums lejlighed med masser af lys og gr√∏n udsigt.
Lejligheden er centralt beliggende i √òrestad City, n√¶r Byparken, indk√∏bsmuligheder, charmerende vandkanaler, caf√© og restauranter. N√¶rmeste nabo er det store natursk√∏nne Kalvebod F√¶lled, hvor rovfugle sv√¶ver og k√∏er gr√¶sser. Metroen bringer dig til K√∏benhavns Centrum p√• 10 minutter, og du kan g√• til Skandinaviens st√∏rste indk√∏bscenter, Fields, p√• 5 minutter. Porthuset er tegnet af den unge danske tegnestue Holgaard arkitekter og opf√∏rt i 2007. Alt er af h√∏j kvalitet. K√∏kkenet er i ren luksus fra tyske Bulthaup og forsynet med hvidevarer fra Gaggenau. Alle d√∏re er med greb designet af den engelske superdesigner Jasper Morisson. Badev√¶relset er udstyret med Philippe Starck og har bl.a. stor specialbruser med vandfald. Derudover Siemens vaskes√∏jle, bord i m√∏rkt tr√¶ og klinker fra Evers. √òvrige gulve er matlakeret egetr√¶sparket fra Boen. Der er opsat designede persienner fra Botex i alle rum. 
Der er gulvvarme overalt. Lejligheden har indlagt fibernet, store vinduer og en formidabel udsigt i alle rum samt p√¶n og pr√¶sentabel opgang med elevator. 

Der er en tidsbegr√¶nsning for lejem√•let p√• 3,5 √•r, da vi √∏nsker at s√¶lge lejligheden engang.  Det er selvf√∏lgelig muligt at fraflytte f√∏r s√•fremt lejer √∏nsker dette.

Beautiful apartment with sunny balcony for rent in Copenhagen.
Here you can live in the middle of nature and in the middle of the city in this delicious 3-room apartment with lots of light and green views.
The apartment is centrally located in √òrestad City, near the City Park, shopping opportunities, charming water canals, cafe and restaurants. The nearest neighbor is the large scenic Kalvebod F√¶lled, where birds of prey soar and cows graze. The metro takes you to Copenhagen City Center in 10 minutes, and you can walk to Scandinavia's largest shopping center, Fields, in 5 minutes. The gatehouse was designed by the young Danish design studio Holgaard Architects and built in 2007. Everything is of high quality. The kitchen is in pure luxury from German Bulthaup and equipped with appliances from Gaggenau. All doors are with handles designed by the English super designer Jasper Morisson. The bathroom is equipped with Philippe Starck and has i.a. large special shower with waterfall. In addition, Siemens washbasin, dark wood table and tiles from Evers. Other floors are matt lacquered oak parquet from Boen. Designed blinds from Botex are installed in all rooms. There is underfloor heating throughout. The apartment has inlaid fiber net, large windows and a formidable view in all rooms as well as nice and presentable staircase with elevator. 

There is a time limit for the lease of 3.5 years, as we want to sell the apartment someday. It is of course possible to move out earlier if the tenant wishes. 
The monthly consumption expenses on account are 800 kr. Showings/open house events are held continuously until the apartment is rented. 
Call or write if you would like a showing.

title: Eksklusiv lejlighed med to altaner og vandudsigt
description:
Nordhavn er en unik blanding af moderne urbanitet og maritime omgivelser, hvor du kan nyde b√•de byens puls og roen fra havet. Badev√¶relset er stilrent og funktionelt med brus og vaskes√∏jle, og i entr√©en er der ligeledes god garderobeplads. Der er gennemg√•ende lyse gulve sildebensparket i hele lejligheden. 

Lejligheden er perfekt placeret i Nordhavn, et af K√∏benhavns mest eftertragtede omr√•der. Her finder du et v√¶ld af caf√©er, restauranter, butikker og oplevelser. Langs havnebassinet er der anlagt fine promenader, og der er perfekte muligheder for badning √•ret rundt. 

Kronl√∏bs√∏en stod f√¶rdig i 2023 som en helt ny √∏ i Nordhavn. Inspirationen er hentet fra de geologiske aflejringer, som ses p√• M√∏ns Klint, og som blandt andet afspejler sig i materialebrugen og altanernes fremspring. 
Under Kronl√∏bs√∏en er der parkeringsk√¶lder i flere etager med muligheden for el-opladning, og hele to Metro stationer er kun f√• minutters gang fra lejligheden.

------

Exclusive apartment with two Balconies and sea views

Nordhavn is a unique blend of modern urbanity and maritime surroundings, where you can enjoy both the city's pulse and the sea. This bright and inviting 91-square-meter apartment is located in the heart of Nordhavn on the attractive Kronl√∏bs√∏en, completed in 2023. Here, you get an exceptional location with views of the sea. With it‚Äôs modern design and two balconies - you have the opportunity to enjoy both the sea view and the peaceful atmosphere of the well-designed courtyard.

The apartment is rented out fully furnished from July 15. If you prefer your own furniture, it can also be rented unfurnished.
The apartment features a spacious bedroom with built-in closets, an office, and an open, modern kitchen in dark smoked oak. From here, you can enjoy views of the sea and step out onto one of the two spacious balconies. The bathroom is stylish and functional with a shower and a washer/dryer unit, and the entrance area also offers great wardrobe space. Throughout the apartment, there are light herringbone parquet floors.

The apartment is located in Nordhavn, where you will find many caf√©s, restaurants and shops. Along the harbor basin, well-designed promenades there are excellent opportunities for all-year swimming.
Kronl√∏bs√∏en was completed in 2023 as an entirely new island in Nordhavn. It‚Äôs design was inspired by the geological formations of M√∏ns Klint, which is reflected in the use of materials and the distinctive balcony structures.

Beneath Kronl√∏bs√∏en, there is a multi-story underground parking garage with electric charging options, and two Metro stations are just a few minutes‚Äô walk from the apartment.

Rent this unique apartment and experience what it‚Äôs like to live with the water as your neighbor in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most exciting areas.

Please note that residence registration at this address is not possible.

title: Top shelf apartment with stunning views
description:
One of the best uninterrupted views over Copenhagen and the canal. This 8th floor apartment offers a generous 116 m2 living space split in two spacious bedrooms, a practical hallway, a huge open kitchen and living room, one large bathroom and a guest toilet. 

Quality and a balance with nature is key themes for this new modern building. Among other this results in a joinery kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures and hard wood oak herringbone floors. To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 34 m2 balcony with large, planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

A complimentary private underground parking spot is also available upon request. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

The building was finalized in March 2023, which is why some of the pictures are illustrations only. However, we have also added a video. 

We are renting the apartment out until Oct. 31. 2025 while we are working abroad. 

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

Bright and inviting apartment centrally located on Frederiksberg

Welcome to this unique, two-level apartment located at the top of a nice, newer property on Gammel Kongevej. With its consistent style, large amounts of light and impressive layout, this apartment is an ideal home for both families and couples who want to live centrally in Frederiksberg.

On the upper level is an impressive kitchen-dining room with a vaulted ceiling and a nice inflow of light. Here is plenty of space for both cooking and cozy gatherings. A bright sunroom and the spacious balcony offer the opportunity to enjoy outdoor life with a beautiful view over Frederiksberg's rooftops.
The property has a lift and the apartment comes with a storage room in the basement.

title: Central Frederiksberg with your own beautiful garden
description:
Situated on the same street as some of Frederiksbergs most popular cafes, close to metro, shopping and groceries, this spacious parterre apartment is one of two large apartments in a 19th century beautiful villa with high ceilings and oak parquet floors.
 
This apartment offers a hall, 3 bedrooms, a huge living room (45 sqm), winter garden, eat-in kitchen and large bathroom with a tub and a separate shower room. 
In addition a fully equipped laundry room and two storage rooms in the basement. 

From the winter garden a small staircase leads down to the calm, charming garden with old fruit trees such as figs, plums and apples, and a fantastic magnolia tree. The garden exclusively belongs to the parterre apartment. 

Around the corner is the entrance to Frederiksberg Have, one of Copenhagens most beautiful parks, and a few steps away is a new underground parking facility, free for residents of Frederiksberg, opening in spring 2025. 

This apartment is perfect for a couple perhaps with 1-2 children, looking for spacious and presentable  living quarters in the city. 




Beliggende p√• samme gade som nogle af Frederiksbergs mest popul√¶re cafeer, t√¶t p√• metro, butikker og dagligvarer, er denne rummelige parterrelejlighed en af kun ‚Äã‚Äãto store lejligheder i en smuk 1800-tals villa med h√∏jt til loftet og egetr√¶sparketgulve.

Lejligheden byder p√• en entr√©, 3 sovev√¶relser, en k√¶mpe stue (45 kvm), vinterhave, spisek√∏kken og stort badev√¶relse med badekar og separat brusebad.
Derudover fuldt udstyret vaskerum og to depotrum i k√¶lderen.

Fra vinterhaven f√∏rer en lille trappe ned til den rolige, charmerende have med gamle frugttr√¶er som figner, blommer og √¶bler og et fantastisk magnoliatr√¶. Haven h√∏rer eksklusivt til parterrelejligheden.

Indgangen til Frederiksberg Have, en af ‚Äã‚ÄãK√∏benhavns smukkeste parker ligger rundt om hj√∏rnet, og f√• skridt v√¶k ligger en ny underjordisk parkeringsplads, der √•bner i for√•ret 2025, gratis for beboere p√• Frederiksberg.

Denne lejlighed er perfekt til den mindre familie p√• udkig efter en rummelig og pr√¶sentabel bolig i byen.

Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent.

‚Ä£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Desk

About the building complex:

‚Ä£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

description:
Ejendommen
Velkommen til en nyindrettet perle midt i det eftertragtede Hellerup. Tidligere hjemsted for Egmont Magasiner, har denne smukke ejendom underg√•et en imponerende transformation, hvor PFA har forvandlet den til 35 eksklusive boliger.

Beliggende p√• en rummelig grund og omgivet af gr√∏nne og √•bne omr√•der, byder denne ejendom p√• en unik oase midt i byen. Med 4 etager og parkeringsmuligheder b√•de i k√¶lderen og g√•rden, tilbyder den ikke blot komfort, men ogs√• bekvemmelighed i hverdagen.

Boligerne
Tr√¶d ind i en verden af forskelligartede boliger, hver med deres eget unikke pr√¶g og charme. Fra hyggelige 2-v√¶relses til rummelige 5-v√¶relses lejligheder, sp√¶nder st√∏rrelserne fra 79 m2 til 168 m2, hvilket sikrer, at der er boliger til enhver smag og behov.

Med imponerende loftsh√∏jde og elevatorer i ejendommen, kombineres stil og funktionalitet p√• bedste vis. De fleste boliger nyder godt af solen p√• en sk√∏n syd- eller vestvendt altan eller terrasse, perfekt til afslapning og sociale stunder udend√∏rs.

Omr√•det
Beliggende i g√•afstand til Hellerup Strandvej, Hellerup Havn og det trendy shoppingcenter, Waterfront, har du alt inden for r√¶kkevidde. Nyd natursk√∏nne omgivelser med gr√∏nne parker som √òreg√•rdsparken, Bernstorffsparken og Charlottenlund Slotspark.

Med blot ca. 300 meter til Hellerup Station, hvorfra der afg√•r regionaltog og S-tog, samt cykelafstand til K√∏benhavns Centrum, er denne ejendom perfekt placeret for pendlere og bylivs-entusiaster.

Oplev den ultimative kombination af luksus, komfort og bekvemmelighed, n√•r du bos√¶tter dig i denne unikke ejendom i hjertet af Hellerup.

Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.

Her har stueetagens lejligheder alle egen badebro og direkte adgang til vandet, hvorfra du kan dyppe t√¶erne eller nyde en tur i kajakken i de sm√• hyggelige kanaler, der omgiver Nobelholmen p√• Enghave Brygge.

Der er selvf√∏lgelig gulvvarme i alle rum. I v√¶relserne og k√∏kkenalrummet er det Haros slidst√¶rke matlakerede premiumgulv i eg, der skaber et roligt nordisk udtryk. Badev√¶relserne har simple og elegante elementer fra Designa, med hvide klinker i bruseniche og moderne gr√• klinker, der skaber en rolig kontrast.

description:

Boligerne har sin beliggenhed i en ny og attraktiv bydel i Valby. Her kan du nemt udleve dr√∏mmen om at bo i en af K√∏benhavns nye og inspirerende bydele.



Du vil som lejer bo i g√•afstand til blandt andet Metro, indk√∏bsmuligheder og fitnesscenter. Kun fire minutters gang fra lejligheden vil du n√• til Ny Ellebjerg Station. Kvadratmeterne er godt fordelt med et √•bent k√∏kken/alrum og stue i √©t. Lejlighedernes imponerende loftsh√∏jde er udnyttet til at bygge en lille hems, som passende kan bruges som kontor eller sovev√¶relse.

Hvis man dr√∏mmer om en moderne lejlighed med √•ben planl√∏sning, men samtidigt √∏nsker at bo i en bygning med sj√¶l og industriel karakter, er Tagensvej det perfekte sted.

title: Stor lys 3 v√¶relses med altan.
description:
Indretning: 

Denne sk√∏nne og optimerede lejlighed starter med at byde dig velkommen i en entr√©. 

Herefter tr√¶der du ind i det store √•bne k√∏kken-alrum, hvor det smukke hvide Svane k√∏kken, st√•r i god kontrast til de varme egetr√¶sparketgulve med gulvvarme. K√∏kkenet har alt i h√•rde hvidevarer, kogeplade, k√∏le-/fryseskab, indbygningsovn og opvaskemaskine. Det store lyse k√∏kken-alrum kan fint indrettes med spiseafdeling i forl√¶ngelse af k√∏kkenet samt et hyggeligt stueomr√•de. Fra alrummet har man udgang til en dejlig stor sydvendt altan, hvor udelivet og solen kan nydes med et glas koldt at drikke eller en god kop kaffe. 

Sovev√¶relset har en god st√∏rrelse, s√• der er fin plads til b√•de seng og opbevaring. I forl√¶ngelse af sovev√¶relset ligger lejlighedens depotrum, med indbyggede skabe og ekstra plads til opbevaring. 

Desuden byder det ekstra v√¶relse p√• mange anvendelsesmuligheder, alt efter om du har behov for et b√∏rnev√¶relse, kontor eller g√¶stev√¶relse. 

Badev√¶relset er bekl√¶dt med flotte store gr√• fliser, her er separat bruseniche og der er naturligvis indrettet med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig. 

Ejendommen: 

 Flot karr√©ejendom med fantastiske rammer for et st√¶rkt f√¶llesskab, hvor f√¶lleshuset, orangeriet og g√•rdhaven er omdrejningspunktet. 

Ejendommen er tegnet af C.F. M√∏ller Architects og byder p√• 264 lejligheder. 

I g√•rdhaven finder du en r√¶kke f√¶llesfaciliteter, heriblandt vores charmerende f√¶lleshus med sit tilh√∏rende og hyggelige orangeri, som er designet til at fremme trivsel og skabe grobund for et spirende f√¶llesskab. 

H√∏rk√¶r Have st√•r til at blive DGNB guld-certificeret. Det er din garanti for at flytte ind i en ejendom, hvor der er t√¶nkt p√• milj√∏et samt din sundhed og trivsel. Her er blandt andet anvendt milj√∏venlige materialer, s√∏rget for et godt indeklima og skabt gode, v√¶rdiskabende f√¶llesfaciliteter. 

Omr√•det: 

H√∏rk√¶r Have ligger centralt i Herlev, et stenkast fra Herlev bymidte og kun 13km fra K√∏benhavns R√•dhusplads. 

Med S-togstationen, Motorring 3 og letbanen der √•bner i 2025, er alle muligheder √•bne. Med base i H√∏rk√¶r Have er du aldrig langt fra din n√¶ste destination ‚Äì mens n√¶rmilj√∏et byder p√• alt du beh√∏ver, for at skabe en god og nem hverdag med masser af livskvalitet.

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

‚Ä£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
‚Ä£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
‚Ä£ Loft with bed 
‚Ä£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
‚Ä£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
‚Ä£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
‚Ä£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on B√ºlowsvej 
‚Ä£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚Ä£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Restaurants, parks, caf√©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. Omr√•det:

title: Bright & Stylishly Furnished Apartment in Historic Christianshavn
description:
Located in the heart of Christianshavn‚Äôs charming canal district, this tastefully furnished 113 m¬≤ apartment offers the perfect blend of historic charm and modern convenience.

Step into a spacious, light-filled home featuring a welcoming hallway, a large open-plan living and dining area with a fully equipped kitchen, a sleek bathroom with underfloor heating, a generous master bedroom, and a versatile office that doubles as a guest room. 

Thoughtfully decorated with tasteful furnishings, the apartment is move-in ready and includes all modern appliances: washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, fridge, freezer, oven, hob, microwave and TV. 

A private storage room just outside the entrance provides easy access and extra space, and the building is serviced by a lift for added convenience.

Ideally situated just minutes from the metro and multiple bus routes, the apartment offers seamless connectivity: only 12 minutes to Copenhagen Airport and 3 minutes to Kongens Nytorv. 

Despite its central location, the property is tucked away in a peaceful development, offering a quiet retreat within walking distance of Christianshavn‚Äôs vibrant caf√©s, restaurants, and cultural attractions.

This apartment is perfect for professionals or couples seeking stylish city living in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most desirable neighbourhoods.

description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent either partially furnished or unfurnished, depending on your preference. The lease period is for 12 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the building‚Äôs shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere ‚Äî ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

I am renting out my little oasis in the best part of N√∏rrebro from right away (March 8th) and until End May/Start June, depending on the agreement made. title: Energivenlige lejeboliger i Gentofte.
description:
Boligerne er opf√∏rt i eksklusivt design, hvor alle detaljer er gennemt√¶nkte og udf√∏rt i det laveste energim√¶rkning A. Tilmed er der fjernvarme fra Gentofte kommune. Der skal derfor forventes meget lave energiomkostninger.

title: Apartment in central and hip N√∏rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant N√∏rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. You‚Äôll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of N√∏rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: K√∏lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. The apartment is tucked away on a side street off Rantzausgade, ensuring you won‚Äôt be disturbed by any noise during your stay. Plus, with S√∏erne, Frederiksberg, and Vesterbro just a short walk away, you‚Äôll be right in the middle of it all. You can even complete the "Copenhagen experience" by borrowing a bike just around the corner!

I love helping my guests have the best experience, so feel free to ask me anything! I'm a passionate traveler myself, and the only thing I ask is that you take good care of this beautiful apartment while enjoying your stay!

title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.

description:
A lovely fully-furnished two-room apartment with NoLi Residences. Super convenient to move into, since everything you need is provided, from  crockery and a kettle to bedding and towels. Suitable for two. 

There are workspaces, meeting rooms, and a communal space with a kitchen which can be booked for events, free of charge. There are various classes e.g. yoga/pilates etc. running on a weekly basis for residents to join for a fee. 

Amager Faelled (nature reserve) is situated just behind ‚Äî perfect for biking, running or just taking a Sunday stroll during sunset. There are also plenty of playgrounds to occupy the kids. It‚Äôs a really international area which has a friendly vibe. It‚Äôs a 10-minute walk to Vestamager metro and 20 minutes to Fields shopping centre on foot. 

Please note, I am the current tenant and happy to do a viewing via FaceTime or in-person.  
Ideal move in date: 15th March, alternatively 1st April. 

Contracts available range from 1 to 8 months, with the possibility to extend. 
An 8-month stay is 17.580,

NOTE: The images are of a similar residence and property in Carlsberg Byen. The floor plan is accurate.

An exclusive, newly built, and spacious 2-room apartment is now available for rent in the popular Carlsberg Byen, located in H√∏ffings T√•rn.

The apartment features an optimal layout, making full use of every square meter. Upon entering, you step into the kitchen area, which has space for a dining table. The kitchen, designed by HTH, has a sleek and minimalist aesthetic with a handleless design, a white countertop, and built-in appliances from Miele. From the kitchen and dining area, you have direct access to the apartment‚Äôs French balcony with a folding door‚Äîor through the bedroom‚Äîallowing you to enjoy a view of the rest of Copenhagen.

The kitchen flows seamlessly into the living room, which is set back from the entrance, creating depth and a natural flow throughout the apartment. Adjacent to the living room, you will find the bedroom.
The bathroom is designed with drawer modules, a laundry tower (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and a sink in artificial marble from Marmorline. The walls and floors of the bathroom are adorned with pastel green Mosa tiles.
Overall, this apartment is executed in a minimalist and Nordic style, with great attention to aesthetics. The flooring consists of white-pigmented, lacquered oak planks from BOEN, featuring underfloor heating throughout the entire apartment. The fixtures are from Grohe, and all appliances are from Miele.

Included in the apartment: All appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, and cooktop.

Included in the property: Basement storage, bicycle storage, and a courtyard area. Parking spaces are available for rent.

*AVAILABLE FROM 1st of June 2025*

WHY THE APARTMENT
If you want to live centrally in Carlsberg Byen, CPH, with a fantastic view and tranquility from the 25th floor, this apartment could be perfect for you. Located in H√∏ffdings Tower, this exclusive 2-room apartment spans 62 m¬≤, plus a 2 m¬≤ balcony. The apartment faces east/south, providing perfect conditions to enjoy sunrises over √òresund and views of central Copenhagen. It maintains a comfortable temperature in the afternoon and evening, with the view preserved without sun-blocking curtains.

The apartment has an optimal layout, utilizing every square meter. The entrance leads to an open kitchen from HTH with a minimalist design, white countertop, and Miele appliances. From the kitchen, you enter the living room, which is set back from the entrance. The living room leads to the bedroom with access to a French balcony with folding doors.

The bathroom features drawer modules, a laundry column (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and an artificial marble sink from Marmorline. The fixtures are from Grohe, and the appliances are from Miele.

The apartment is designed in a minimalist Nordic style with white-pigmented lacquered oak floors and underfloor heating. Under the building, there is a parking basement with the option to rent a parking space, as well as storage rooms, a bicycle basement, and a courtyard.

WHY CARLSBERG BYEN
Carlsberg City, nestled between Frederiksberg, Valby, and Vesterbro, offers a unique blend of urban life, historic architecture, and green spaces. With extensive parks, multiple and diverse dining options, grocery shopping, gym and much more, it‚Äôs designed for an active and convenient place to live in Copenhagen.
Popular among internationals, this vibrant district is family-friendly, hosting a European school and offering convenient commuting options and it is just 10 minutes by bike from the city center. Residents also enjoy easy access to offices outside Copenhagen, with the train/metro station a short 5-minute walk away from the apartment.

title: Exceptionally well located apartment in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor!
description:
Welcome to Herluf Trolles Gade!

For dansk tekst; se sidst i annoncen.

Here you will find an apartment in a class of its own, measuring 159 square meters, and is located in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor in what can be described as one of Copenhagen's most central and best locations. This provides an astonishing amenity value.

The apartment has been modernized, and has a stately feel.

You enter a large entrance hall where there are two smaller storage rooms for storing outerwear or anything else that needs to be put away.

From the entrance you can access a large bathroom with separate shower. In addition, from the entrance there is access to a very extraordinary utility room, which contains closet space, sink and washer and dryer.

In the second part of the apartment, there is a large kitchen, located in an orval room, where there is plenty of space to place a large dining table. Next, the apartment has two large living rooms, one of which can optimally be used as a sofa room, and the other as a dining room. Both rooms are located with a view of the wonderful Copenhagen harbor, and have a fantastic light.

Finally, the apartment has two large bedrooms, where there is plenty of space to have a bed, closets, desk, etc. One bedroom is located overlooking Copenhagen's harbor.

This is a fantastic apartment, which is some of the absolute best Copenhagen has to offer.

_______________________________________

*******************

Absolutely fantastic large 2V, 109 m2 penthouse apartment in Gemini Residence "Silo" is rented out.

The apartment is at the top of the Gemini Residence.

This apartment has no residency requirement and is perfect as a commuter apartment for people who work in Copenhagen but have permanent residence elsewhere.

(Historically, all new apartments have been without a residency requirement until the first person registers their residence and the apartment will then always be with a residency requirement. Copenhagen has stopped with a residency requirement. Apartments without a residency requirement make it possible to use the apartment and have an address registered at another address. I plan to live abroad one day in the future and live in this apartment when I stay in Denmark for some periods. Therefore, the apartment must still be without a residency requirement).

With the apartment can be included in private parking space with private electric charger in the basement, approx. 10 meters from the glass elevator. Parking space costs DKK 1,000.00 per day. month.

Rented fully equipped and furnished with new design furniture. All equipment for bedroom, kitchen and bathroom is in the apartment. All kitchen furniture is included. Large balcony with a look all over the √òresund and Copenhagen.

Super central, within walking distance to the metro, the harbor bath and the charming "old" brew with cafes, small specialty shops, etc. In addition, close to City Hall Square, Christianshavn. The shopping center Fisketorvet is located just across the other side with access via bicycle bridge.

Large living room with design sofa arrangement, new large TV, broadband internet, dining table with design chairs, well integrated with nice and complete bright luxury kitchen with all equipment (plates, pots, glass etc.). Everything for the bedroom is included, including duvets, pillows and sheets, etc.

Note: The apartment can potentially also be rented unfurnished.

Large bedroom with wardrobe.

Lovely bathroom with washing machine and dryer. Shower with glass door.

In short, nothing is missing before moving in.

I am responsible for the practical payment of electricity, TV, internet and heat, etc., so you have to do nothing but move in with your personal belongings and simply pay monthly rent.

Possibility of borrowing free kayaks in properties.

Write a little about yourself, number of residents, wanted rental period and wanted time to move in.

Viewing can be arranged at anytime you wish, but preferably Saturday or Sunday from 2:00 PM.

Please do not hesistate to write to me or send an sms

Best regards Soren

Dette lejem√•l er et sj√¶ldent fund, hvor du har muligheden for at leje noget helt unikt og i en smuk historisk bygning, der tidligere har tilh√∏rt den katolske kirke. I 1800-tallet var Polly Berling, tidligere ejer af Berlingske Tidende, en markant skikkelse. I 1869 konverterede hun til den katolske tro, og efter sin mands d√∏d to √•r senere √∏nskede hun at √¶re sin nye tro ved at skabe noget meningsfuldt. Hendes vision var klar: en katolsk skole og kirke for drenge. Med k√∏bet af landstedet Ordrupsh√∏j i 1863 l√• grundstenene til hendes dr√∏m allerede klar. I 1873 stod den smukke arkitekttegnede skole og kirke endelig f√¶rdig p√• Ordrupsh√∏j. Nu, n√¶sten 150 √•r senere, st√•r dette historiske monument som et tidl√∏st symbol p√• Polly Berlings engagement og vision. En del af dette historiske kompleks er nu blevet omformet til fem eksklusive lejeboliger af enest√•ende karakter.

Skriv eller ring for en fremvisning. Vi gl√¶der os til at vise dig denne smukke bolig.

title: Bright Apartment with Floor Heating
description:
(English Description can be found at bottom) 

I forl√¶ngelse af Gentoftegade ligger Kongelysvej, en lille blind vej , godt beskyttet mod Lyngbyvejens trafik og st√∏j, men samtidig n√¶r til alt , herunder busser, tog, indk√∏b og postkontor. 

Ejendommen er fra 1937 og den blev i 2003/4 gennemrenoveret fra k√¶lder til kvist med nyindretning af ejerlejligheder. Ny maling fra 2025. Lejligheden der er p√• 119 m2 og 4 v√¶relser, er enkelt og funktionelt disponeret, med et moderne og tiltalende pr√¶g . Der er h√∏jt til loftet i alle rum, aske parket p√• gulvene og gulvvarme overalt. Fra entreen g√•r man gennem en glasd√∏r ind i den ca. 45 m2 store dagligstue, der p√• elegant vis er i √•ben kontakt med det moderne k√∏kken udf√∏rt med Hanstholm elementer og mahogni bordplade. Stuen som er det naturlige samlingspunkt i lejligheden har forbindelse til den store sydvest vendte altan p√• ca 10 m2, sovev√¶relset med indbyggede skabe og det ene af de 2 b√∏rnev√¶relser. Det andet b√∏rnev√¶relse, samt det store badev√¶relse med bord af granit tilg√•s fra entreen. 

Alle h√•rde hvidevarer medf√∏lger (komfur, ovn, k√∏l, frys, opvask, vask og t√∏rretumbler).
Til lejligheden h√∏rer egen parkeringsplads og eget k√¶lderrum, foruden del i f√¶lles
k√¶lderrum. Ejendommen er omkranset af b√∏geh√¶k og lindetr√¶er.

Som udlejere har vi haft flere lejere gennem √•rene, altid med gensidig respekt, og alle har forladt huset tilfredse. Her er, hvad en tidligere lejer skrev:

"Endnu en gang vil jeg gerne udtrykke min dybf√∏lte taknemmelighed for jeres vedvarende st√∏tte gennem √•rene og for at v√¶re s√• venlige og im√∏dekommende udlejere. "
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In continuation of Gentoftegade, Kongelysvej, a small blind road, is well protected from Lyngbyvejens traffic and noise, but at the same time close to everything, including buses, trains, shopping and post office. The property is from 1937 and it was refurbished from basement to roof in 2003/4 with new features of condominiums. New Paint from 2025.  

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. The another children\'s room, as well as the large bathroom with granite table accessed from the entrance hall. 

All White goods included (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, all in one washing machine and tumble dryer). The apartment has its own car park and own cellar, in addition to shared facilities basement. The property is surrounded by beech hedges and linden trees.

As landlord, I have hosted several tenants over the years, always with mutual respect, and all have left the house satisfied. Here‚Äôs what one of my former tenants had to say:

"Once again, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support over the years and for being such a kind and friendly landlord. "

title: Spacious 4 rooms new 128 m2 apartment
description:
The apartment is on the 11th floor with a south-west facing living room and a spacious balcony - it gives a beautiful view directly over the city and parks!

You enter a beautiful and spacious entrance hall, which gives access to your large living room with an open kitchen. 
The entrance also gives access to a guest toilet/bathroom and a spacious bedroom that could be a guest bedroom or bed room for grown up kids. 
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in closet and attached toilet/bathroom and washing machine & dryer.
In addition, there is a small room besides master bedroom, which could be used as a child room or study/work room or simply as an extension of the living room. 

The area is surrounded by beautiful parks and gardens for a walk, jog, or a family picnic - JC Jacobsens Have, Enghave Parken, S√∏ndermarken, and Frederiksberg Have.

For families with children, there are many good children institutions right in the backyard and the famous European School Copenhagen is at a walkable distance. There are lots of wonderful playgrounds, free time activity centers for children, sports/fitness centers nearby. Copenhagen Zoo is like 15-20 minutes walk from the apartment - yes, we could go on.

There are 3 big supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Resturants, rooftop bars, cafes, bakeries, spa, shops are all located within 5 minutes walk. 

The apartment location is super convenient, you can easily take S-Train (Carlsberg Byen Station), Buses, and Metro-train (Enghave Plads Metro). Within 5 minutes you can reach Central Train station and Tivoli. 

The apartment comes with a big storage room in the basement. 
There is paid Car parking available very conveniently under the apartment tower. 

The apartment is rented out for a maximum of 24 months (with a possibility to renew), but less duration can also be agreed.

NOTE: 
- THE PHOTOS ARE OF A MODEL APARTMENT.
- VIDEO is representative of same size apartment in the building, from a higher floor

title: 3 v√¶relses lejlighed p√• Islands Brygge i K√∏benhavn S udlejes
description:
Gemini er latin og betyder tvillinger, og det giver jo meget god mening, n√•r man ser p√• den gamle fr√∏silo p√• Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, kaldes siloen i dag, som nok er mere siamesiske tvillinger end bare tvillinger, for siloerne i den gamle sojakagefabrik fletter sig ind i hinanden i et arkitektonisk mesterv√¶rk. 84 lejligheder er her, alle bygget uden p√• siloerne, og de kunne ikke ligge bedre i deres eget 8-tal lige ved Bryggebroen og lige over for Fisketorvet.¬†¬†
Alle 143 m2 er vendt mod vandet. Det samme er terrassen, der er lang som lejligheden og har sol fra morgen til aften. Gemini Residence stod f√¶rdig i 2005. Det indvendige af 8-tallet er en tom skal med foyer, trapper og elevator, og det hele ligger under et gennemsigtigt tag. Det er nyt√¶nkning, der vil noget. Kvarteret med den gamle sojakagefabrik er omd√∏bt til Havnestad, hvor en del af de gamle bygninger enten er restaureret eller ombygget. Gemini Residence, Pressesiloen, Zeppelinerhallen og Wennbergsiloen er nogle af dem. 
De er alle b√∏rn af et slidt, industrielt omr√•de, men Islands Brygge har de sidste snart 25 √•r udviklet sig til det mest hippe og eftertragtede kvarter. Fra at vende ryggen til vandet, vender det i dag krop og ansigt mod K√∏benhavn p√• den anden side af vandet. Kreativ byplanl√¶gning med havnebad og promenadeliv g√∏r, at Bryggen og Havnestad i dag st√•r som et raffineret miks af moderne byliv med n√¶rmilj√∏, caf√©er og l√¶kre butikker. Byens bedste kulturtilbud er lige p√• den anden side af vandet. Bryggen har rammerne, som med broer og havnebus forbinder det bedste af alt. 
Ledige P-pladser er der ikke mange af p√• Bryggen, men som lejer f√∏lger der en parkeringsplads med. Den ligger under ejendommen med elevator op til lejligheden. Det er ikke biler, der dominerer Bryggen, det er cykler og ladcykler derimod, p√• cykelstier med indk√∏bsposer, b√∏rn og k√¶rester som uskyldsrene passagerer p√• ladet.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Gemini is Latin and means twins, and it makes a lot of sense when you look at the old seed silo at Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, as the silo is called today, is probably more Siamese twins than just twins, because the silos in the old soy cake factory intertwine in an architectural masterpiece. There are 84 apartments here, all built on the outside of the silos, and they couldn‚Äôt be better located right by Bryggebroen and right across from Fisketorvet.
All 143 m2 face the water. So does the terrace, which is as long as the apartment and has sun from morning to evening. Gemini Residence was completed in 2005. The inside of the silos is an empty shell with a foyer, stairs and elevator, and it‚Äôs all under a transparent roof. It‚Äôs innovation that matters. The neighborhood with the old soy cake factory has been renamed Havnestad, where some of the old buildings have either been restored or rebuilt. 
in the last 25 years Islands Brygge has developed into the hippest and most sought-after neighborhood. From turning its back on the water, it now faces Copenhagen on the other side of the water. Creative urban planning with a harbor bath and promenade means that Bryggen and Havnestad today stand as a refined mix of modern city life with local environment, cafes and delicious shops. The city‚Äôs best cultural offerings are just on the other side of the water. Bryggen has the framework that, with bridges and the harbor bus, connects the best of everything.
There are not many vacant parking spaces at Bryggen, but as a tenant, a parking space is included. It is located under the property with an elevator up to the apartment.

Parkering ‚Äì Ja 
Husdyr ‚Äì Nej
Elevator ‚Äì Ja
